title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, the expected behavior is for a menu to popup allowing the user to add breakpoints/marks. However, in Photon, this menu is not appearing.
OB: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
EB: A menu should popup, allowing the user to add breakpoints/marks.
SR: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. Verify that no menu is appearing.
